name: Going Deep Web
description:
The WebGL version of my LD48 game.

This is the newer version which has 3 sound effects.  YES!!!!  3 WHOLE SOUNDS!!!!

There is a strategy to the game.  You can't just dig through the level.  You have to power your drill with the pellets.  Read the instructions (press Escape).  If you try to drill through ALL the dirt, you'll run out of power and be stuck underground... FOREVER!!!!!

The game is available for download HERE:

https://ifman1.itch.io/going-deep-yo
